item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：市场关键周伊始，英镑上涨
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 芯片初创公司 Groq 与阿美石油公司达成协议，支持沙特的人工智能雄心
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Groq Inc. 与石油生产商阿美石油公司（Aramco）合作，在沙特阿拉伯建立了一个巨型数据中心，希望它能成为中东、非洲和印度各地运行人工智能系统的公司的枢纽。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Groq Inc. has partnered with oil producer Aramco to build a giant data center in Saudi Arabia that it hopes will become a hub for companies running AI systems across the Middle East, Africa and India.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 矿工发现 1,094 克拉钻石数周后又发现另一颗巨石
item.description: 卢卡拉钻石公司（Lucara Diamond Corp.）在博茨瓦纳的一个矿区又发现了一颗巨大的钻石，这是该公司一个月内的第二次重大发现。【原文：Lucara Diamond Corp. has recovered another mammoth diamond from a mine in Botswana, its second major find in about a month.】

item.title: 美联储利率下行的起点是 "一步 "还是 "一跳
item.description:
50个基点的可能性各占一半，但无论如何，鲍威尔都不会再独自站在顶峰。【原文：

The odds are 50-50 on a jumbo 50 basis points, but either way Powell won’t be alone at the peak any longer.

】

item.title: 供应不足导致新加坡房屋销售再次下滑
item.description: 新加坡新房销售的短暂回升势头已经耗尽，交易量跌至 2 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：A brief recovery in Singapore new home-sales ran out of steam as transactions fell to its lowest level since February.】

item.title: 美元因大量美联储减息押注而下滑至一月以来最低点附近
item.description: 由于交易商越来越倾向于美联储本周降息半个百分点，美元汇率跌至接近 1 月份以来的最弱水平。【原文：The dollar tumbled to near its weakest level since January as traders increasingly leaned toward a half percentage point rate cut by the Federal Reserve this week.】

item.title: 日元自 2023 年以来首次升值至每美元 140 元以上
item.description: 日元对美元汇率突破了 140 这一关键心理价位，日币延续了从 7 月份近 38 年来最疲软时的涨势。【原文：The yen advanced past the key psychological level of 140 against the dollar as the Japanese currency extended its rally from the weakest point in nearly 38 years in July.】

item.title: 汇丰银行新任首席执行官希望撼动欧洲最大的贷款机构
item.description:
分析师称，乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）必须设法在未来几年内削减 20 亿美元的开支。【原文：

Analysts say Georges Elhedery will have to find a way to shave $2 billion in expenses in the coming years.

】

item.title: 交易员押注英国央行对利率的谨慎态度将很快让步
item.description: 英国央行在本周的会议上似乎将坚持其试探性的降息政策，而不理会越来越多的投资者的怀疑，他们认为有必要采取更积极的行动。【原文：The Bank of England looks set to stick to its tentative interest-rate cutting when it meets this week, defying skepticism from a growing cohort of investors who see a need for more aggressive action.】

item.title: 中国对人民币的隐性支持减弱，削弱对冲基金的火热交易
item.description: 一项为对冲基金提供了提高中国债务工具利润的有利可图的交易正开始失去魅力。【原文：A lucrative trade that offered hedge funds a way to ratchet up profits on Chinese debt instruments is starting to lose its charm.】

item.title: 巴贾住宅公司为 2024 年印度最大交易首秀做好准备
item.description: Bajaj Housing Finance Ltd. 首次公开募股超额认购超过 60 倍，其股票将于周一开始交易。【原文：Bajaj Housing Finance Ltd.’s shares are set to begin trading on Monday following an initial public offering that was oversubscribed by more than 60 times.】

item.title: 交易商将在印度 2024 年最大 IPO 中获利
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 比特币在市场等待美联储降息的关键一周伊始下滑
item.description: 比特币在美联储普遍预期的降息前出现回落，这一迫在眉睫的政策变化将于本周晚些时候出台，令全球市场惶恐不安。【原文：Bitcoin retreated ahead of a widely expected interest-rate reduction by the Federal Reserve, a looming policy change due later this week that has global markets on edge.】

item.title: 中国对粮食的饥饿感减弱给世界农民带来麻烦
item.description: 随着经济危机的不断加深，中国各地的仓库都堆满了谷物，全球农民不得不面对他们最大的客户之一长期经济放缓的前景。【原文：Warehouses across China are bulging with grain as a deepening economic crisis takes hold, leaving the world’s farmers to grapple with the prospect of a long-lasting slowdown gripping one of their largest customers.】

item.title: 经济数据令人失望，中国股市在香港下跌
item.description: 在香港上市的中国股票指数下跌，因为宏观数据普遍疲软，使人们对在缺乏全面刺激措施的情况下经济出现有意义反弹的乐观情绪破灭。【原文：A gauge of Chinese stocks listed in Hong Kong fell after broadly weaker macro data dashed optimism of a meaningful rebound in the economy in the absence of comprehensive stimulus.】

item.title: 上海遭遇 1949 年以来最大台风 "贝碧嘉 "袭击
item.description: 贝碧嘉登陆上海后，上海遭受了自 1949 年以来最大的台风袭击，带来了狂风和暴雨，并在国家节日开始时扰乱了度假者的行程。【原文：Shanghai has been slammed by the biggest typhoon since 1949 after Bebinca made landfall, bringing gale force winds and heavy rain, and disrupting holidaymakers at the start of a national festival.】

item.title: 澳大利亚矿业股在本周大涨后承压反弹
item.description: 随着对中国经济增长轨迹的担忧加深，澳大利亚矿业股一年多来表现最好的一周有可能发生逆转。【原文：The best week in over a year for Australia’s mining shares is at risk of reversing as concerns deepen over China’s growth trajectory.】

item.title: 美联储减息在即，全球资金流入将推动印尼盾反弹
item.description: 印尼盾多头押注印尼盾将进一步上涨，因为外国投资者将在关键的利率变动之前大举买入印尼债务。【原文：Rupiah bulls are betting on further gains as foreign investors pile into Indonesian debt ahead of key interest-rate moves.】

item.title: Muzinich 启动高达 10 亿美元的基础设施基金战略
item.description: 美国信贷公司 Muzinich & Co. 和亚洲另类投资平台 Orion3 推出了一项基础设施和不动产私募债务战略，以解决该行业的全球资金缺口问题。【原文：US credit firm Muzinich & Co. and Orion3, an Asian alternative investment platform, have launched an infrastructure and real assets private debt strategy as they seek to tackle the sector’s global funding gap.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 针对特朗普的第二次暗杀企图数据疲软，中国压力增大。三分之二即将退休的澳大利亚人面临养老金短缺。以下是您今天需要了解的信息。【原文：Second assassination attempt targets Trump. Pressure grows on China after weak data. Two-thirds of retiring Australians face pension shortfall. Here’s what you need to know today.】

item.title: 利比亚出口下降抵消了中国数据疲软的影响，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了利比亚原油出口下滑和最大进口国中国经济放缓加深的因素，石油价格持稳。【原文：Oil was steady as traders weighed slumping Libyan crude exports against a deepening slowdown in top importer China.】

item.title: 英国贸易部长在重要投资峰会前访问海湾地区
item.description: 英国贸易大臣乔纳森-雷诺兹（Jonathan Reynolds）将于周一在沙特阿拉伯会见海湾国家官员，因为在下个月举行的一次重要投资峰会之前，英国政府正努力加强与这个资金雄厚地区的联系。【原文：UK Trade Secretary Jonathan Reynolds will meet Gulf state officials in Saudi Arabia on Monday as the government seeks to boost ties with the cash-rich region ahead of a critical investment summit next month.】

item.title: Rightmove 称，英国房屋销售商的提价速度是平时的两倍
item.description: 9 月份，英国房屋要价的增长速度是长期平均增长速度的两倍，这表明在英格兰银行四年多来首次降息之后，房屋销售商又重新乐观起来。【原文：Asking prices for UK houses increased at double their long-term average pace in September, signaling new optimism by home-sellers in the wake of the Bank of England’s first interest-rate cut in more than four years.】

item.title: 中国数据令人担忧，亚洲市场谨慎开盘：市场综述
item.description: 在上周末一系列不及预期的中国经济活动数据公布后，亚洲股市周一开盘谨慎。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a cautious open Monday after a slew of worse than expected Chinese economic activity data landed over the weekend.】

item.title: 中国经济增速放缓考验习近平对增长失误的容忍度
item.description: 今年 1 月，李强总理曾大肆宣扬中国在没有采取 "大规模刺激政策 "的情况下，成功超额完成了 2023 年的经济增长目标。现在看来，今年重演同样壮举的可能性较小。【原文：Back in January, Premier Li Qiang trumpeted China’s success in exceeding its 2023 growth goal without resorting to “massive stimulus.” Repeating the same feat this year now looks less likely.】

item.title: 二十问迪士尼娱乐主席
item.description:
Dana Walden 分享了迪士尼打造第二个全球—和 盈利—流媒体服务的秘诀。【原文：

Dana Walden shares Disney’s playbook to build the second global — and profitable — streaming service.

】

item.title: 塔塔航空巨型合并里程碑之后仍面临艰难爬坡
item.description: 塔塔集团在 2021 年收购印度航空公司时，承担了两项艰巨的任务：扭转这家濒临破产的航空公司的颓势，并恢复其作为一家以客户为中心的航空公司的声誉。【原文：When the Tata Group bought Air India in 2021, it signed up for two gigantic tasks: turning the ailing carrier around and resurrecting its prestige as a customer-centric airline.】

item.title: 优步承包商败诉后，新西兰着手修改法律
item.description: 新西兰正在修改法律，以便在承包商声称自己是雇员并因此有权享受更多福利时为企业提供保护。【原文：New Zealand is changing the law to protect businesses when contractors claim they are employees and therefore entitled to more benefits.】

item.title: 本周全球商品市场值得关注的五大图表
item.description: 丹佛黄金集团（Denver Gold Group）第 36 届年度论坛在科罗拉多州拉开帷幕，金银创纪录的走势给投资者、分析师和行业专家带来了许多话题。汽油和柴油期货相对于原油的溢价正在下降，这对美国炼油商来说是一个利空信号。北半球的夏季即将结束，全球各地创纪录的温暖天气给大宗商品带来了更多挑战。【原文：Bullion’s record-setting ways are giving investors, analysts and industry experts plenty to talk about as Denver Gold Group’s 36th annual forum gets underway in Colorado. The premium for gasoline and diesel futures over crude oil is falling in a bearish sign for US refiners. And the dying days of summer in the Northern Hemisphere brings an end to record warmth across the globe that added challenges for commodities.】
